channel.title: Problem with runserver.bat
channel.description: when i try to run my server it say it can't find the path the compiler work find so i donno what is wrong here it is [code]@echo off title Figmentscape runserver "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_06/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_06/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m server pause[/code] that is my runserver.bat

item.title: Problem with runserver.bat

item.description:
@srisrusry wrote:

[quote=“skiller noob1, post:2, topic:216709”]Then use a different compiler. Just use a different sources compiler. Click edit then paste the new compiler in place of the old one.[/quote] but there is nothing wrong with my compiler its my runserver

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Then use a different compiler. Just use a different sources compiler. Click edit then paste the new compiler in place of the old one.

item.title: Problem with runserver.bat

item.description:
@srisrusry wrote:

when i try to run my server it say it can’t find the path the compiler work find so i donno what is wrong
here it is @echo off title Figmentscape runserver "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_06/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_06/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m server pause
that is my runserver.bat
